## [DataSourceFormula](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/data-source-formula)

### Methods

|                                                                        Method                                                                         |                                                 Return type                                                  |                                                                      Brief description                                                                       |
|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [cancelDataRefresh()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/data-source-formula#cancelDataRefresh())                        | [DataSourceFormula](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/data-source-formula)     | Cancels the data refresh associated with this object if it's currently running.                                                                              |
| [forceRefreshData()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/data-source-formula#forceRefreshData())                          | [DataSourceFormula](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/data-source-formula)     | Refreshes the data of this object regardless of the current state.                                                                                           |
| [getAnchorCell()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/data-source-formula#getAnchorCell())                                | [Range](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/range)                               | Returns the [Range](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/range) representing the cell where this data source formula is anchored. |
| [getDataSource()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/data-source-formula#getDataSource())                                | [DataSource](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/data-source)                    | Gets the data source the object is linked to.                                                                                                                |
| [getDisplayValue()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/data-source-formula#getDisplayValue())                            | `String`                                                                                                     | Returns the display value of the data source formula.                                                                                                        |
| [getFormula()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/data-source-formula#getFormula())                                      | `String`                                                                                                     | Returns the formula for this data source formula.                                                                                                            |
| [getStatus()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/data-source-formula#getStatus())                                        | [DataExecutionStatus](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/data-execution-status) | Gets the data execution status of the object.                                                                                                                |
| [refreshData()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/data-source-formula#refreshData())                                    | [DataSourceFormula](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/data-source-formula)     | Refreshes the data of the object.                                                                                                                            |
| [setFormula(formula)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/data-source-formula#setFormula(String))                         | [DataSourceFormula](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/data-source-formula)     | Updates the formula.                                                                                                                                         |
| [waitForCompletion(timeoutInSeconds)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/data-source-formula#waitForCompletion(Integer)) | [DataExecutionStatus](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/data-execution-status) | Waits until the current execution completes, timing out after the provided number of seconds.                                                                |
